segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Two children are engaged in a secret operation, it seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little boy is bravely climbing onto a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into an open upper cabinet, his arm stretched out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, I see a jar in there labeled “COOKIE JAR” – how clever!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and a plate in the other, ready to catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His accomplice, a little girl, stands below him, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, clearly expecting her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together in perfect silence, a true partnership.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The determination on their faces is quite something to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those forbidden cookies myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must be enjoying this mischievous little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks a bit wobbly, which adds to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught before they secure their delicious loot.
segments.speaker: PAR
